sentences.en: Cannot wield is disconsolate, unceasing is temporarily the emotions.
sentences.cn: 挥不去的是惆怅 、 暂不断的是情思.

sentences.en: Disconsolate, Soapy ceased his unavailing racket.
sentences.cn: 索比怏怏不乐地停止了白费力气的闹嚷.

sentences.en: He did not have much success, but tried not to get too disconsolate.
sentences.cn: 他没有获得太大的成功，但也试着不让自己太过郁闷。
他觉得郁郁不乐, 冷酷而疲惫.

sentences.en: He looked so disconsolate that It'scared her.
sentences.cn: 他看上去情绪很坏,吓了她一跳.

sentences.en: He was disconsolate after his bicycle was stolen.
sentences.cn: 他的自行车被偷后,他郁郁不欢.

sentences.en: I was the most dejected, disconsolate creature alive.
sentences.cn: 我是世界上最沮丧的 、 最忧郁的人.

sentences.en: Mary was disconsolate because her kitten died.
sentences.cn: 玛丽感到绝望的,因为她的小猫死了.

sentences.en: She is disconsolate at the death of her cat.
She was disconsolate about her son's death.
The disconsolate ladies of the company were without a leader.
sentences.cn: 那些郁郁不乐的乐团女演员们就群龙无首了.

sentences.en: The team returned disconsolate from three losses.
sentences.cn: 连输三场的球队归来时闷闷不乐.

sentences.en: They were rather disconsolate, did not know what to do.
sentences.cn: 他们郁郁寡欢, 不知干什么好.

sentences.en: What's the most disconsolate thing recently.

sentences.cn: 她为什么总是郁郁不乐的?

sentences.en: You must be able to disclaim all of your worldly possessions without becoming disconsolate.
sentences.cn: 你必须做到放弃你财产而无半点悲伤.

words.tran_cn: 悲伤地，愁闷地；凄凉地；令人不快地
郁郁不乐的；忧郁的；孤独的

trans.tran_cn: 孤独的，郁郁不乐的，怅怅不乐，惆怅
trans.tran_en: Someone who is disconsolate is very unhappy and depressed
